text: Making beds everywhere...even in IKEA showrooms! 🤦‍♀️
Fancy linens costing more than some salaries here...but guests love 'em.

Feel you on the old templates issue. Hospitality's got its own flavor of "traditional expectations." Pro tips gone unheard until they're echoed by someone else—usually male colleagues. Subtle assertiveness has been key; repeat till recognized!
Definitely takes strategic persistence—especially with proposal pitches. They listen... after assertiveness becomes second nature!
Hospo management isn't immune either—gender bias exists here too!
Finding balance key – exploring old & new hobbies revitalizes!

Crazy how downtime's spent can differ so much among folks flying solo! Some might deep dive into creative stuff; others just chill with Netflix marathons. For me? It’s been devouring books on business leaders—go figure!
Life’s not on autopilot; we choose our destinations.
